about_the_game:
The Depths of Avalon is a cooperative top-down dungeon crawler where players take on the roles of Arthur and Merlin to challenge the dark enchantress Morgan La Fey. This game encourages teamwork with two players using console controllers to navigate through puzzles and battles deep within the dungeons of Avalon.

Set in the realm of Arthurian legends, the story brings together characters from these stories to create a narrative that blends myth with interactive gameplay. The game's art style features a low-poly design, giving it a unique visual flair that complements its fantasy setting.

Developed over 14 weeks by a group of 16 talented second-year students at Butler Community College and published by Ad Astra Studios, a local non-profit, The Depths of Avalon showcases their hard work and creativity. The game is built using Unity 2022.3.16f1 and Blender 4.0.

Grab a partner and prepare to explore the dungeon below Avalon, solving puzzles and fighting bosses along the way!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Join Arthur and Merlin in The Depths of Avalon, a cooperative top-down dungeon crawler where you solve puzzles and battle enemies to thwart the dark plans of Morgan La Fey.
